data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Moskva to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moskva, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Moskva, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Moskva, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, make the 103,833 believers in Moskva to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 6,991,267 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, general people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Moskva.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Over 42.41 percent of the people of Moskva are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Moskva, Russia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Moskva
location.people_groups_list: Vietnamese, Pashtun, Northern, Karakalpak, Persian, Czech
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vietnamese (14,000), Pashtun, Northern (5,500), Karakalpak (1,500), Persian (3,800), Czech (1,900)
